title: Remote Sensing Image Caption Generation: Self-Directed Learning-Based Solution Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts, experience in remote sensing data processing, and comprehension of deep learning model architectures
context.additional_context: Simulating high-quality caption generation technology with limited labeled data in a virtual environment, exploring methods to improve model performance through self-learning algorithms.

learning_goals: Applying self-training techniques (SFRC) to a limited remote sensing image dataset improves caption-generation model accuracy by over 20%
Learners develop the ability to design feature extractors using BYOL-based self-supervised learning
Learners implement and validate a self-distillation process between teacher-student models in a simulation environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
